translation.en: ♪ Gather around For the Animal Name game ♪

translation.en: [all] ♪ "B" like a bumblebee Buzzing like a bumblebee ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Bumblebee starts with "B" ♪ [all] ♪ Alligator starts with "A" ♪

내 이름은 제이제이 제, 제, 제이제이

translation.en: [all] ♪ "J" like a jellyfish Jiggle like a jellyfish ♪
[both] ♪ Our names start With the letter "N" ♪
[Nina] ♪ Narwhals like to take a nap ♪
♪ And that's how you play The Animal Name game! ♪
Okay, kids. We need fruits that are red, blue and yellow.
translation.ko: 좋아, 얘들아 빨강, 파랑, 노랑 과일을 찾아보자

translation.en: [all] ♪ Find the red and blue And yellow fruits ♪
♪ What do we see at the grocery? ♪
♪ Red, red! Which one is red? ♪
♪ Red, red. Which one is red? ♪
[all] ♪ Find the red and blue And yellow fruits ♪
♪ What do we see at the grocery? ♪
♪ Look over there At all the round and colorful fruits ♪

translation.en: ♪ Blue, blue! Which one is blue? ♪
[Kwame and Cody] ♪ I found a blue fruit! ♪
♪ Blue, blue. Which one is blue? ♪
[Cody and JJ] ♪ Honk, honk! Blue, blue! ♪
♪ Find the red and blue And yellow fruits ♪
♪ What do we see at the grocery? ♪
[both] ♪ Yellow, yellow Reach for the yellow ♪
♪ I see yellow and so do you ♪
[all] ♪ We found the red And blue and yellow fruits ♪
♪ And brought them home to eat ♪
translation.ko: 전부 사 들고 집에 가서 먹자

translation.en: Okay, class. Our bus will be here at twelve o'clock.
translation.ko: 자, 여러분 버스가 열두 시에 올 거예요

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ One, two, three o'clock Four o'clock, rock ♪
translation.ko: 한 시, 두 시, 세 시, 네 시 춤을 추자

translation.en: [all] ♪ Five, six, seven o'clock Eight o'clock, rock ♪
translation.ko: 다섯, 여섯, 일곱 시, 여덟 시 춤을 추자

translation.en: ♪ Nine, ten, eleven o'clock Twelve o'clock, rock ♪
translation.ko: 아홉, 열, 열한 시, 열두 시 춤을 추자

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Put your glad rags on And join me, hon ♪
♪ We'll have some fun When the clock strikes one ♪
[all] ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
♪ We're gonna rock, rock, rock In broad daylight ♪

♪ If the band slows down We'll yell for more ♪

[all] ♪ We're gonna rock, rock, rock In broad daylight ♪
♪ We're gonna rock, gonna rock Around the clock 'til night ♪
♪ When the chimes ring five Six and seven ♪
